title: Manhunt underway for Gonzalo Lopez after ‘armed and dangerous’ murderer escaped prison bus - Yahoo News
content:
1. Manhunt underway for Gonzalo Lopez after ‘armed and dangerous’ murderer escaped prison bus  Yahoo News
  2. Day 3 - Unconfirmed sightings of Lopez, search continues for escaped inmate in Leon County, TX  KAGSTV
  3. Texas increases reward to $22500 for escaped fugitive  UPI News
  4. Intense manhunt continues for Texas murderer who made violent escape  KENS 5: Your San Antonio News Source
  5. $15K reward for 'very dangerous' escaped killer still on the loose in East Texas  KHOU 11
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: A manhunt was underway on Saturday for an inmate who escaped a prison transport bus and allegedly stabbed a correctional officer on Thursday afternoon in Texas — and authorities are offering a $22,500 reward for any information leading to his capture.
